_meta.source: Royal Caribbean official website, Royal Beach Club materials, Paradise Island local guides, Nassau tourism resources

bbox_hint.note: Covers Royal Beach Club, nearby Paradise Island attractions, and Nassau waterfront

transit_routes.name: Royal Caribbean Shuttle
transit_routes.note: Direct shuttle included for all Royal Beach Club guests. Departs from Prince George Wharf.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Royal Beach Club
transit_routes.note: For independent travelers. Crosses Paradise Island bridge.

transit_routes.name: Walk to Atlantis
transit_routes.note: Short walk along Paradise Island coastline to Atlantis entrance.

transit_routes.name: Walk to Cabbage Beach
transit_routes.note: Public beach access adjacent to Royal Beach Club.

featured_experiences.name: Royal Beach Club Day Pass
featured_experiences.note: Day passes $129+ for adults (2025 pricing). Book through Royal Caribbean or independent operators. Limited capacity - advance booking essential.

featured_experiences.name: Overwater Cabana Upgrade
featured_experiences.note: Premium upgrade $300+. Very limited availability. Book well in advance.

featured_experiences.name: Thrill Waterpark Adventures
featured_experiences.note: Included with day pass. Life jackets provided. Height restrictions apply for some slides.

featured_experiences.name: Cultural Junkanoo Performance
featured_experiences.note: Scheduled performances throughout the day. Check daily schedule upon arrival.
